TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MimeFormatter extends System.Object

summary.span: 为使用 HTTP 实现但不支持 SOAP 的 Web 服务和客户端提供所有读取器和编写器的抽象基类。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class for all readers and writers for Web services and clients implemented using HTTP but without SOAP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 服务作者和读者序列化和反序列化，分别之间 Web 方法的参数或返回对象和 HTTP 请求或响应流。Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameter or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams. 类建立通用接口和功能，对于读取器和编写器类，在客户端和服务端。The class establishes a common interface and functionality for reader and writer classes, in both client and service-side . 类支持通过 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 操作的 Web 服务的.NET Framework 的实现。The class supports the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. 在 HTTP GET 操作中请求参数进行编码在 HTTP 请求的统一资源定位器 (URL)。In HTTP-GET operations request parameters are encoded in the HTTP request's Uniform Resource Locator (URL). 在 HTTP POST 操作中，请求参数在 HTTP 请求正文中，编码与 HTML 窗体一样。In HTTP-POST operations, request parameters are encoded in the HTTP request body, as with an HTML form. 使用这两个实现，返回值将显示在 HTTP 响应正文中作为非 SOAP XML 文档。With both implementations, the return value appears in the HTTP response body as a non-SOAP XML document. 开发人员通常不必直接使用或其子代类。A developer typically does not need to directly use or its descendant classes. 相反，当 Wsdl.exe 工具生成的 HTTP GET 或 HTTP POST 实现根据客户端代理代码，它适用每个 Web 方法和设置的特性和为适当的类型的属性派生自类。Instead, when the Wsdl.exe tool generates client proxy code according to the HTTP-GET or HTTP-POST implementations, it applies the to each Web method and sets the attribute's and properties to the appropriate type derived from the class. 在服务器上，根据设置 ASP.NET 配置文件 (Web.config) 中使用相应的派生的类型。On the server, the appropriate derived types are used according to settings in an ASP.NET configuration file (Web.config). 在客户端上从 WSDL 确定相应的派生的类型。On the client the appropriate derived types are determined from the WSDL.

summary.span: 创建和初始化从 派生的具体类的实例。

span.span: Creates and initializes an instance of a concrete class derived from .
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建派生类的实例并调用抽象的派生的类的实现方法。The method creates an instance of the derived class and invokes the derived class's implementation of the abstract method. 在处理请求或响应时调用方法。The method is invoked at the time a request or response is processed. 初始值设定项是一个对象作为参数传递给方法。An initializer is an object passed as a parameter to the method. 初始值设定项作为参数传递给方法从另一个实例的派生类中，通过调用获得在客户端或服务初始化过程中的方法。The initializer passed as a parameter to the method is obtained from another instance of the derived class, by invoking the method during client or service initialization.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，返回指定方法的初始值设定项。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns an initializer for the specified method.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract object GetInitializer (System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo methodInfo);

Public MustOverride Function GetInitializer (methodInfo As LogicalMethodInfo) As Object

abstract member GetInitializer : System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo -> obj

param.name: methodInfo
param.span: ，指定为其获取初始值设定项的 Web 方法。

span.span: A that specifies the Web method for which the initializer is obtained.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，返回指定方法的初始值设定项。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns an initializer for the specified method.

returns.span: 包含指定方法的初始值设定项的 。

span.span: An that contains the initializer for the specified method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始值设定项是一个对象作为参数传递给方法。An initializer is an object passed as a parameter to the method. 派生的类的实现在客户端或服务初始化期间调用实例方法。A derived class's implementation of the instance method is invoked during client or service initialization. 更高版本，在处理请求或响应时，初始值设定项对象传递给静态方法，用于创建派生的类，然后到另一个对象的实例方法对其进行初始化。Later, at the time a request or response is processed, the initializer object is passed to the static method, which creates an instance of another object of the derived class, and then to the method to initialize it. 另一个对象执行实际的读取或写入。The other object performs the actual reading or writing.

span.span: A object that contains the initializer for the specified method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始值设定项是一个对象作为参数传递给方法。An initializer is an object passed as a parameter to the method. 静态方法将调用派生的类的方法中，隐式创建派生类的实例。The static method invokes the derived class's method, implicitly creating an instance of the derived class. 在处理请求或响应时，初始值设定项对象传递给派生的类的另一个实例方法。At the time a request or response is processed, the initializer object is passed to the method of another instance of the derived class. 后一种对象执行实际的读取或写入。The latter object performs the actual reading or writing.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，返回与方法定义的输入数组对应的初始值设定项对象的数组。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns an array of initializer objects corresponding to an input array of method definitions.

param.name: methodInfos
param.span: 一个 Web 方法数组，对于每个方法，都将从该数组中获取一个对象，获取的对象与返回的初始值设定项数组中相应的索引对应。

span.span: An array of Web methods where, for each method, the object of the corresponding index in the returned initializer array is obtained.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，返回与方法定义的输入数组对应的初始值设定项对象的数组。

span.span: An array of initializer objects corresponding to the input array of method definitions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始值设定项是一个对象作为参数传递给方法。An initializer is an object passed as a parameter to the method. 实例方法调用实例方法，为每个输入 Web 方法。The instance method invokes the instance method for each input Web method. 这意味着派生自的类的实例已创建。This means an instance of a class derived from has already been created. 在处理请求或响应时，初始值设定项传递给派生的类的另一个实例方法。At the time a request or response is processed, the initializer is passed to the method of another instance of the derived class. 后一种对象执行实际的读取或写入。The latter object performs the actual reading or writing.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，初始化一个实例。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, initializes an instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在处理请求或响应时调用方法; 但是，通过调用获取初始值设定项在客户端或服务初始化过程中的另一个实例上的方法。The method is invoked at the time a request or response is processed; however, the initializer is obtained by calling the method on another instance during client or service initialization.
